snippet: The mobster James (Whitey) Bulger may have written two autobiographies, according to prosecutors, who have notified his lawyers that they may use the memoirs at his trial.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say mobster James (Whitey) Bulger may have written two autobiographies, and notify his lawyers that they may use the memoirs at his trial.
lead_paragraph: The mobster James (Whitey) Bulger may have written two autobiographies, according to prosecutors, who have notified his lawyers that they may use the memoirs at his trial.

headline.seo: Massachusetts: Bulger May Have Written Memoirs
headline.main: Massachusetts: Bulger May Have Written Memoirs
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Bulger May Have Written Memoirs
